explanation: [0-0] On a gray countertop, there is a silver-white board with grids. A green mobile phone is placed on the board, and a hand is holding a red brush on the back of the phone.

[0-3] Then a hand cleans the back of the phone with the brush. After cleaning the back of the phone, the left hand takes out a mobile phone film with geometric patterns, and then the right hand tears off the protective layer of the phone film.
